titleStmt.title: The city-dames petition, in the behalfe of the long afflicted, but well-affected cavaliers. Presented to the supreme powers of this Kingdome.
titleStmt.author: Stradling, Mrs.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Mrs. I. Stradling, .. [and 13 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
